## Test Set

**Two types of test sets are provided for Track 1:**

**Set 1(Regular Set)**: Contains songs generated by the same models used in the training set.

**Set 2(Hard Set)**: Includes songs generated by 10 different open-source models, offering a more diverse and challenging evaluation scenario. This set aims to assess each modelâ€™s generalization ability to unseen generation systems.

[**Download link**](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1nAx25FC1xDhi5CDabrCivjVoeO3IgT2d?usp=sharing)
